title: América Futebol Clube (AL)
text:
América Futebol Clube, commonly known as América Alagoano or América-AL, was a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="S%C3%A3o%20Lu%C3%ADs%20do%20Quitunde">São Luís do Quitunde</a>, <a href="Alagoas">Alagoas</a>. The team last participated in the <a href="Campeonato%20Alagoano%20%28lower%20levels%29">Campeonato Alagoano Segunda Divisão</a> in the 2005 season.
History.
The club was founded on 8 June 1952.
Stadium.
América Futebol Clube play their home games at <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Municipal%20Eduardo%20de%20Melo%20Gon%C3%A7alves">Estádio Municipal Eduardo de Melo Gonçalves</a>, nicknamed "Eduardão". The stadium has a maximum capacity of 1,000 people.
